input.sentences: we got to the house to pack the things away .
the treadmill was one of the heavier items .
we trudged over and put the objects into the truck .
even with four men | some of the objects were hard to carry .
as we left | we realized the fence needed a bit of mending next time we come out .
output.sentences: An older house surrounded by plant life is about to receive some improvements.
The men are bringing what appears to be a treadmill into the home.
This of course requires them to work together as it is quite heavy.
And getting it through such a small door clearly caused some complications and frustration for them.
But in the end, the view of the garden along the fence makes it all worth it.
